name: tm08
effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rock Smash Gen I: Body Slam)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Bulks up the body
to boost both
ATTACK & DEFENSE.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP.
The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The target is attacked with a powerful beam.
The user can’t move on the next turn.
